Dwarf/The Chosen • Thrall

name: Appeasement
effect:
Stance
Melee strikes by characters in this rank gain +3 ATK against characters of opposite alignment compared to their own).

effect:
Armor
+2 Skill
Cleric and fighter only.

Shield

Elf • Scout • Marksmanship +7 • Stealth +7

Weapon • Shield • Cursed

Unique • Charisma +2

name: Bastion

Dwarf

name: Beckon the Sea

Water

React: After this wizard performs a Water action, target up to two characters within 2 ranks: Each target must succeed with a Magic save (DC 2 + this wizard's Skill) or become spent and suffer one wound.

effect:

Mercenary • Hero • Epic

Nothrog • Barbarian • Powerattack +7

effect:
Deverenian • Paladin

Charisma +5

Gauntlet

effect:
Helm
While this fighter has 3 or more other items equipped, he gains +2 HP.

name: Bloodstone Rose
effect:
Unique • Charisma +2
Elf only.

effect:
Rogue and wizard only.

effect: Order: Spend Boots: Move forward or backward up to two ranks.

name: Bradley
effect:
Free Kingdoms

Armor

Deverenian

Air

Fire • Water

Nothrog

Free Kingdoms

Armor

Dwarf • Construct

Weapon

Deverenian

Spend Order: Remove X cards in any player's discard pile from the game, where X is this rogue's Level.

Armor

Deverenian • Warlord

Gauntlet

Elf/Free Kingdoms

Unique • Charisma +2

effect:
Fire

Fire

name: Frosttalon

Bow

Melee strikes by Dragons inflict an additional wound against this character.

Deverenian • Stormwraith • Planar

Deverenian • Stormwraith • Planar • Unique

name: Golden Tablet
effect:
Unique

name: Goodwife's Parry

name: Grapple
effect: Order: You may spend this fighter: Perform a melee strike that does not inflict wounds and may, if you spent this fighter, target an additional rank away. If the strike hits, spend the target.

name: Stanchion
effect:
Deverenian/Dwarf • Cantor
Order: Spend a character in this rank, target a character within 1 rank: The target gains +3 ATK or +2 AC until end of turn.
"I have been sent by King Alaric himself. He proposes an armistice."

name: Stolen Substance
effect: Order: Perform a +8 ranged strike that does not inflict wounds. If the strike hits, until end of turn the target does not count for preventing illegal ranks.
"Now you know what it feels like to be a Stormwraith. Only powerless." - Ghed Headrix

name: Sumptuous Feast
effect:
Unique • Charisma +2
Mercenary only.
Order: Spend Sumptuous Feast, discard a card: Move a non-opposing Monster or Dragon forward or backward one rank.
"When dealing with their kind you better have some snack ready. Provided you mind not ending as one yourself." - Azam

name: Sunder the Soul
effect:
Necromancers perform this action without spending.
Spend Order: Target a non-Warlord character within 2 ranks: The target must succeed with a magic save (DC 10 + this wizard's Skill) or attach Sunder the Soul. While it is attached, the target gains the Cursed trait and suffers -2 Levels.

name: Swamp Hydra
effect:
Mercenary • Monster
Hydra may not equip items.
For each charge on Hydra, it has an additional melee strike (base +5 ATK) when it attacks and +1 HP.
React: Once per turn, after Hydra kills an equal or higher Level opposing character: Put a Charge (2 if the character was a The Chosen Daemon) on Hydra.

name: Sword Master
effect: React: After this fighter kills an equal or higher Level opposing character: This fighter permanently gains +1 Level, +2 ATK, +2 AC, +2 Skill, and +1 HP. Until end of turn, this fighter gains +1 Level for equipping items. You may search your deck for a Weapon that this fighter can legally equip and equip it to him. Shuffle your deck. Remove Sword Master from the game.

name: Tacus Fylde
effect:
Free Kingdoms/Nothrog
While Tacus is Level 5 or higher, he gains the Warlord trait.
React: Once per turn, after Tacus kills an equal or higher Level opposing character: He permanently gains +1 Level, +2 ATK, +2 AC, +2 Skill, and +1 HP.

name: Take a Rest
effect:
This card is also a Level 1 rogue action.
React: After target equal or lower Level character within 1 rank readies or unstuns during the Decree phase: Stun the target. Perform a melee strike against the target.
"You look tired. Let me help, friend." - Taisia

name: Taking Trophies
effect:
While this card is in your discard pile, your Rangers have the ability to perform it with an additional effect of removing it from the game.
React: Before this fighter kills target opposing character within 1 rank: Until end of turn, this fighter gains +X ATK, AC, and Skill, where X is equal to the target's Level +3.

name: Tempest Arrow
effect:
Arrow
React: Before making a ranged strike roll, spend Tempest Arrow: The strike does not inflict wounds. If it hits, target all characters in the same rank as the target of the strike. Each target must make two magic saves (DC 13). If one is failed, the target becomes spent. If both are failed, the target becomes stunned and suffers a wound.

name: Tempest Guard
effect:
Deverenian
While Tempest Guard has a primary ATK of +4 or more, he gains the Planar trait.
React: After the decree phase: Tempest Guard permanently gainst + 2 ATK.
"Some of the locals have become true believers, Father Jourdain. Cannot you see their devotion?"

name: Tether
effect:
Summoners gain +2 Levels for performing this action.
Spend Order: Attach this card to target lower Level character within 2 ranks: While one or more Tethers are attached, the target gains +1 HP, an additional melee strike (base target's primary ATK) when he attacks, and the ability "This character is not considered Summoned and may not be returned to your hand or deck."

name: The Retiarius
effect:
Nothrog • Unique
The Retiarius' melee strikes inflict an additional wound.
While The Retiarius is in your front rank and not stunned, all characters enter play as if they were one Level higher.

name: The Sweetest Death
effect: Order: Spend a rogue in this rank: Perform a melee strike that may target an additional rank and does not inflict wounds. If the strike hits, move the target forward one rank and he cannot perform actions to move until end of turn.

name: Thessyrian War Chariot
effect:
Armor
This fighter may equip two additional Steeds.
Order: Spend an equipped Steed: Perform a +0 melee strike.

"Steering an old Thessyrian War Chariot was considered an art. It was so sleekly built, the charioteer couldn't fit any armor, and the whip was used against both, the horses... and any enemies." - Kaiten

name: Thimblerig
effect:
React: After this rogue performs an order: He performs an order.
Order: Move forward or backward 1 rank.
"Have you ever seen a good thimblerig in action? Imagine what those hands can do, when they hold a blade. Like this." - Talin Tzin

name: Thunderclap Bracers
effect:
Gauntlet
This card is also a Level 6 fighter item.
React: After this character hits target character with a melee strike, spend Bracers: Move the target backward one rank.
Order: Discard a card: Perform a +0 ranged strike (+4 if this character is in the front rank). Ready Bracers. This is an Air action and a spell.

name: To My Side
effect:
Tactics
Spend Order: Move target ready character you control adjacent to this rogue, regardless of formation. The target succeed with a Stealth check (DC 15) or become spent.
Acanothropis slid through the bushes like the snake that gave him his name.

name: Totem Crawler
effect:
Familiar
+3 Skill
React: Once per turn, after an opposing character moves forward without spending or stunning: Move a character you control forward one rank.
"With no totem of its own, Centipede is content to serve others, scurrying to win favor like a goblin." - Pelanth

name: Tresven
effect:
Elf • Scout
React: After Tresven enters play: Perform a +4 ranged strike against target spent character.
Spend Order: Perform a +1 ranged strike.
"I am back. You can tell the others. What? You are gurgling. Oh well, I'll tell them myself."

name: Treyik
effect:
Elf
After Treyik is discarded from your hand, you may put him into play from your discard pile.
Order: Kill an Undead: Target Elf gains +3 ATK and +3 AC until end of turn.
"Positive life force, negatve life force. If you understand the arithmetic, you can use it!"

name: Tri-Claw
effect:
The Chosen • Daemon
React: Before Tri-Claw is killed by an opposing character: Move target non-opposing Daemon forward one rank.
"They look daunting, but they are maggots, really. It's their piercing death cries that attract much bigger daemons like flies to a carcass." - Taisia

name: Twist the Blade
effect:
While this card is in your discard pile, your fighters have the ability to perform it with an additional effect of removing it from the game.
React: Before performing a melee strike from an attack: All strikes from the attack ignore AC bonuses not from Armor.
"A single cut might barely slay the creature. It's best to make sure you destroy something truely vital." - Sir Wallence

name: Undead Steed
effect:
Steed
While Undead Steed is in the discard pile, Necromancers you control have the ability, "Order: Remove a character or Steed in your discard pile from the game: Retrieve Undead Steed from your discard pile and equip it to this character."
Order: Spend Undead Steed: Move forward or backward one rank.

name: Vannod
effect:
Nothrog • Druid
Spend Order: Target a character within 2 ranks: The target must succeed with a Poison save (DC 13) or suffer a wound. If the target fails by 10 or more or rolls a Critical Failure, you may remove one wound from target Nothrog.

name: Velk
effect:
Nothrog • Assassin • Stealth +6
Deverenians and spent characters may not perform reacts to or during Velk's strikes.
"Merely tell me which of those pampered dandies has offended you, my battle-mistress, and I shall bring you his heart."

name: Vengeful Spirit
effect:
Mercenary • Necromancer • Undead • Planar
Vengeful Spirit gains +3 to strike rolls and DC saves against Dwarves.
React: After target character is hit with a melee strike by Vengeful Spirit: The target must succeed with a Magic Save (DC 13) or permanently lose one Level.

name: Veteran Training
effect: Spend Order: Target non-opposing character within 1 rank performs an attack, spending as usual, but uses the printed ATK of this fighter instead of his own.
"I keep tellin' ya - practice, practice, practice!" - Sir Wallence

name: Victoria
effect:
Free Kingdoms
Victoria is a cleric and a fighter and enters play as if she were Level 3.
Victoria may not start in play.
Other equal or lower Level Free Kingdoms in this rank gain +2 ATK.
"Meek? Never underestimate a mother who is protecting her young."

name: Void Stalker
effect:
The Chosen • Daemon
Spend Order: Perform a melee strike against target Level 1 or 2 character. If the strike hits, remove the target from the game.
Order: Kill a Level X Thrall: Move forward or backward up to X ranks.
"And from the cellars a terrible beast rose. Whoever it touched ceased to be." - Fragments L.3

name: Volley
effect: Spend Order: Perform a +4 ranged strike. You may spend X Levels of non-opposing characters to gain a +X bonus for the strike. If you spent 2 or more characters this way, the strike inflicts an additional wound.
"That's why they call the first wave to break up the dwarves' defenses the Forlorn Hope." - Set'rokh

name: Waking Terrors
effect: Order: Target opposing character within 3 ranks must succeed with a magic save (DC 13, DC 18 if this wizard is an Illusionist) or move to the rank behind his formation's last rank.
"A multitude of haunts weakens the barriers to the ephemereal world." - Evon Myerdeth

name: War Eagle
effect:
Familiar
Order: Once per turn, War Eagle performs a melee strike that may target an additional rank away as if it were a Level 3 fighter with +4 ATK, 13 AC, +4 Skill, and 1 HP.
"Appearances can be deceptive, as well you know." - Drasek Berenj

name: War Plans
effect:
Unique • Charisma +2
Nothrog only.
Order: Spend War Plans, discard a card: Target Siege gains +8 to strike rolls until end of turn.
"I'll consider your tactical suggestions Set'rokh, but never regard me your servant." - B'alam Nak

name: Whirlwind Ring
effect: Order: Once per turn: Perform a +5 ranged strike that does not inflict wounds. If the strike hits, move the target backward one rank. This is an Air action.
"Trinkets our fathers gave to our mothers to soothe their pains after bedding them." - Zul'Tan

name: Whizzwhir
effect:
Mercenary • Monster • Construct
Reaxt: After your Warlord rolls initiative, reveal a Level X action card from your hand: Until end of turn, Whizzwhir gains the card's class(es) and +X ATK, AC, and Skill.
"A most versatile creation." - Roshni

name: Wigglewort Poison
effect:
Poison
Order: Perform a +8 melee strike that does not inflict wounds. If the strike hits, attach Wigglewort Poison to the target. While it is attached, the target suffers -2 Skill, gains the Poison trait, and has the ability, "After the ready phase: Succeed with a Poison save (DC 13) or suffer a wound."

name: Witchwood Catapault
effect:
Nothrog • Siege • 2 Charges
May not equip items.
Order: Once per turn, remove a Charge, target a Nothrog in this rank: The target's next strike this turn inflicts an additional wound against Daemons and ignores the Planar trait.
Spend Order: Perform a +6 ranged strike.
"Hard to get, but worth the pains." - Scyrax

name: Wogh
effect:
Mercenary • Troll
React: Twice per turn, before Wogh suffers wounds: Succeed with a Skill check (DC 15) to reduce the wounds by 1.
"Hmm. He might be a pup of mine. Won't help him much." - Krenthor Gouge

name: Wrath
effect:
Dwarf • Seer
Wrath is a cleric and a fighter.
Wrath inflicts an additional wound against The Chosen.
Melee strikes by Wrath and adjacent Dwarves ignore the Planar trait.
Order: Once per turn: Target Dwarf gains Powerattack +8.

name: Xaros the Mist
effect:
Deverenian • Illusionist
React: After Xaros enters play: Move target Deverenian you control forward or backward one rank.
React: Once per turn, after Xaros moves target Deverenian: Succeed with a magic check (DC 18) to move the target forward or backward one rank.

name: Yeg-Igryll's Altar
effect:
Nothrog/The Chosen • Siege • 1 Charge
May not equip items.
Order: Kill a Level X character: Put X Charges on Yeg-Igryll's Altar.
React: Before target character makes a melee strike roll, remove a Charge: The target gains +4 ATK for the strike. Wounds from the strike may not be reduced.

name: Yoke
effect:
Dwarf
May not start in play.
Yoke is a cleric and a fighter and enters play as if he were Level 3.
While Yoke is the only character you control in this rank, he gains +5 ATK, AC, Skill, and +1 HP.
React: After Yoke enters play: He counts as an additional character for determining illegal ranks until end of turn (permanently if Yoke entered play as part of a card effect).
"He carried me out on his back." - Gethseme
